name: Vested XOR
description: vXOR is vested XOR. It is called vested XOR because it is “turned into” XOR over time by taking a part of the daily burned XOR amount and buying back and burning vXOR. As it eventually can be turned into XOR, it is a companion token. All new vXOR has to be backed by output and will be created by on-chain governance, voted on by XOR token holders. 99% of the daily remint of XOR is proposed to buy back and burn vXOR.
